parameters.content:
- ### Trigger workflow if date is between valid from and to dates.
- ### Update status to be between (Active and Expired)
- ### Create  / Update Pricing Rule in ERP.
- ### Create new price for item in website.

parameters.jsonBody:
=[
  {
    "title": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["pricing_title"] }}",
    "disable": 0,
    "apply_on": "Item Code",
    "price_or_product_discount": "Price",
    "mixed_conditions": 0,
    "is_cumulative": 0,
    "coupon_code_based": 0,
    "apply_rule_on_other": "",
    "selling": 1,
    "buying": 0,
    "applicable_for": "",
    "min_qty": 0,
    "max_qty": 0,
    "min_amt": 0,
    "max_amt": 0,
    "same_item": 0,
    "free_qty": 0,
    "is_recursive": 0,
    "valid_from": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["valid_from"] }}",
    "valid_upto": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["valid_to"] }}",
    "company": "Three Spears Limited",
    "currency": "KES",
    "margin_type": "",
    "margin_rate_or_amount": 0,
    "rate_or_discount": "Rate",
    "apply_discount_on": "Grand Total",
    "rate": {{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["rate"] }},
    "discount_amount": 0,
    "discount_percentage": 0,
    "threshold_percentage": 0,
    "priority": "",
    "apply_multiple_pricing_rules": 0,
    "apply_discount_on_rate": 0,
    "validate_applied_rule": 0,
    "doctype": "Pricing Rule",
    "items": [
      {
        "parent": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["pricing_title"] }}",
        "parentfield": "items",
        "parenttype": "Pricing Rule",
        "idx": 1,
        "docstatus": 0,
        "item_code": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json["query"]["item_code"] }}",
        "doctype": "Pricing Rule Item Code"
      }
    ],
    "item_groups": [],
    "brands": []
  }
]

parameters.text: =Item  {{ $('Webhook').item.json.query.item_code }} being promoted is not on website. Kindly investigate.
